Name: morerequests:fallingstone
Text:
Hello Potion Seller! I come here with some bad news...
 My brothers, Lario and Muigi and I were exploring these huge caves.
 And these huge stone faces fall on 'em!
 I'm pretty sure I can still remember the 'thwomp' the stone made when their legs were crushed.
 You got something to help 'em right?
